text: The sixth generation iPad Mini (sold as iPad mini) is a tablet computer that is made and sold by Apple Inc. It has a screen size of 8.3 inches, compared to the 10.2 inch screen on a regular iPad. It was released on September 24, 2021 It is the successor to the iPad Mini (5th generation). Category:IPad Category:Apple products released in 2020s Category:Apple hardware Category:Tablet computers
title: IPad Mini (6th generation)
